snippet.title: Ministry of Broadcast | Available NOW on Steam, GOG, Utomik
snippet.description:
Ministry of Broadcast is available now on Steam, GOG, and Utomik. Coming soon to Nintendo Switch.

A country divided by the wall. To cross it and reach your family, you must compete on - and win - a reality TV show.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/874040/Ministry_of_Broadcast/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/ministry_of_broadcast
Utomik: https://www.utomik.com/games/ministry-of-broadcast

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/hitcents
Follow the devs: https://twitter.com/ofbroadcast

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/hitcents
